trans-unit.source: Represents the delegate for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs"></xref> event.

The WebPartVerbsEventHandler class is used to specify the methods that are invoked in response to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event, which occurs when the Web Parts verbs are created for a zone that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe WebPartVerbsEventHandler é usada para especificar os métodos que são invocados em resposta a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>evento que ocorre quando os verbos de Web Parts são criados para uma zona que deriva da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>

trans-unit.source: Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action.
trans-unit.target: Verbos de partes de Web representam as ações que os usuários podem executar na interface do usuário (UI) de uma página de Web Parts, como minimizar, fechar ou controles de restauração. adicionando controles a uma página. ou cancelar uma ação.

trans-unit.source: Verbs can appear in both the header and footer areas of a zone, and there are both standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom verbs that can be added by developers.
trans-unit.target: Verbos podem aparecer em áreas de cabeçalho e rodapé de uma zona e há verbos padrão fornecidos com o conjunto de controles de Web Parts e verbos personalizados que podem ser adicionados por desenvolvedores.

trans-unit.source: A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um verbo é representado na interface de usuário por um objeto que pode ser clicado, que você pode definir aparecem como um hiperlink, uma imagem ou um botão, usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone provides a standard set of verbs that get rendered in a Web Parts control's verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>zona fornece um conjunto padrão de verbos renderizado no menu de verbos do controle de Web Parts.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: A custom Web Parts zone, or a Web Parts control inside a Web Parts zone, can add additional verbs to the menu.
trans-unit.target: Uma zona de Web Parts personalizada, ou um controle de Web Parts dentro de uma zona de Web Parts, pode adicionar verbos adicionais para o menu.

trans-unit.source: A control in a Web Parts zone can add verbs to the control's verbs menu by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class and overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um controle em uma zona de Web Parts pode adicionar verbos para o menu de verbos do controle herdando a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>base classe e substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the control does not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class, you can add a new verb by implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface, and then overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle não herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>classe base você pode adicionar um verbo novo Implementando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>interface e, em seguida, substituindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method allows derived classes to override the event without attaching a delegate to it.
trans-unit.target: Protegido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método permite derivadas de classes para substituir o evento sem anexar um delegado para o proprietário.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A derived class must always call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method of the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe derivada deve sempre chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>método da classe base para garantir que representantes registrados recebam o evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>
